subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_e8a55d04-0699-4fde-93d6-518247ccc0db_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 Hmmm sounds like basic humanity to me.  I'd aim for a higher level, and s=
tay away from basements.  
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: eric=
k_hunter9@...: Thu, 15 Nov 2007 15:42:06 -0800Subject: RE: [EVP-I=
TC] my opinion on the mini box





Bruce,  the boxes aside,  I am talking =
about Ghosts, period.  The boxes are for simple communication,  not inter-a=
cting.  When I say "inter-acting" I don't mean trade a few words,  I'm refe=
rring to Meaningful interaction.  Making a Statement,  passing on a message=
 to me or a living relative,  predicting or causing "physical" inferances. =
  I've experienced every kind of Ghost,  I feel certain,  all over the worl=
d.  I have experience with them that most people just dream about...or fear=
.  I have been carressed,  molested,  poked,  probed,  slapped,  punched,  =
knocked down and physically Picked Up by a Ghost.  I have confronted them f=
ace-to-face while they were both visible and invisable.  I have numerous ti=
mes held conversations with them via voice recorder and once even one-on-on=
e (it was the experience of a life-time!).  I was Hunting Ghosts many, many=
 years before it became a fad,  or cool to do so.  And,  believe me,  I am =
far from being an "expert".  I do not presume on Ghosts or their personalit=
ies.  Every time in the past that I've done so,  I've been rocked back on m=
y heels,  psychologically speaking. Some are good,  some are not.  Many of =
them very much enjoy making you the fool (that's a lot easier done with som=
e people than are others!) .  It doesn't matter in the slightest what you T=
hink of them,  They are what they are,  and "being a friend" is definitely =
not on their list of priorities!  That goes for All of them.  They will pla=
y with you.  They will lie to you.  They will tell, or imply to you, what t=
hey know you want to hear,  that or they will laugh at you.  I have persona=
lly heard their laughter,  on more than one occasion.  The first step in be=
ginning to understand Ghosts is to quit watching stupid TV Ghost Dramas,  a=
nd learn to be discernful about Reality.  God bless, anyway.        --Rod
 =

 
 
 
bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:


Rod, N=
o disrespect but how do you know what ghosts havethe where with all to do? =
I speak with them through frank and joe's box on a daily basis and consider=
 thetwo that are communicating daily to be friends. I believe you are speak=
ing of grounded spirits not etherals and ghosts that are grounded most defi=
nately interact with us. residual ghosts and hauntings do not that is whyth=
ere is a distinction between the two intelligent and residual hauntings. bu=
t we are not talking generaly about haunting spirits that communicate throu=
gh frank and joe's boxes, but all types of entities and don't call anyone d=
illusional unless you yourself have experienced your own research with the =
boxes. Bruce 

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.comFrom: erick_hunter9@...: Thu, 15 Nov 2007 14:18:55=
 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box



I certainly agre=
e with the point of Bruces' statement,  but I fear he's being delusional ab=
out "friends" from the other side affecting some inter-action between a box=
 and the user,  not letting one work,  the box chosing it's owner,  etc., e=
tc., etc.  In the first place Ghosts are Not our Friends!  That's pure, una=
dulterated Fantasy.
The Ghosts do not have the where-with-all to accomplish=
 this in the first place, and even if they did they don't give a rats' rear=
 end what a Ghost Hunter does or doesn't do.  That boy really needs to get =
real.  Ghosts simply do not re-act to the living in that way, or much of an=
y other way except to allow us to see or hear them and then only when they =
want it to happen.  Their most obvious and biggest trait is to be totally i=
ndifferent to our wishes.   Over 40 yrs. of Investigating the Paranormal ha=
s taught me nothing if it hasn't taught me this.      --Rod
 
 
 velazquez =
<ghostchasingfool@...> wrote:


Here, here Bruce.  I am glad others w=
ho a genuine support my outlook, I couldn't agree more!bhali333 <paranormal=
investigating@...> wrote: 


since I dropped the bomb about this mi=
ni box to Frank s. yesterday I did not expect such a fervent hoopla about i=
t.So I will give my box experienced opinion after lengthy research with bot=
h Frank's and Joe's boxes. I have contacted the manufacturer for an explana=
tion, he instructed me to listen to the audio file and view the demo video =
on his site. After doing so my opinion on this box and the builders intenti=
ons for it is.The box itself is not a knock off of Frank's box but a cheap =
and ineffective version of Joe's box,It works on an AM band instead of an F=
M band as Joe's box does. Another big difference is Joe's box actually work=
s and you have all heard the files I have posted from sessions with it. Aft=
er listening to this box and seeing it in operation I feel that anyone who =
purchases this box will be very disappointed and will not receive any conta=
ct from it and even if they did they probably would not even realise it for=
 the simple fact that you have to have a certain amount of experience with =
box research and operation before developing an ear for picking up real tim=
e communication and also creating a bond with the spirit friends on the oth=
er side and also a measure of trust on both sides.I believe the manufacture=
r to be a capitalist and only interested in the monetary reward to be gaine=
d from offering this cheap and ineffective copy to unsuspecting and naive i=
ndividuals who are interested in this medium. I do not like to bad mouth an=
yone, it usually comes back to bite you in the ass but I believe that our f=
riends on the other side know of our intentions and would not allow someone=
 with the wrong intentions to develop a working tool for communication. als=
o I believe that a person does not pick the box the box picks the person. S=
o let him have his short and lucrative run with this fooling unsuspecting c=
lients, bad karma always comes home.Bruce
